channel.title: Constant in-game crash at giant fan
channel.description: I'm not really sure how much info you guys need besides the minidump, the exact timing of the crash is once I turn the giant fan on, I have about 10 seconds before it crashes, regardless of where I move towards. If any more information is required I'll be glad to include it! hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_20T15_49_51C0.mdmp (94.1 KB)

item.title: Constant in-game crash at giant fan
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Thanks for confirming, nice to know that this solution worked for yet another person suffering from this bug. Definitelly a bug in the BM or in Source engine, most probably related to physics calculations.

Read full topic
item.source: Constant in-game crash at giant fan

item.title: Constant in-game crash at giant fan
item.dc:creator: Linkirvana
item.description:
lexa2:

Search forums. This issue had been reported numerous times, including possible solution/workaround for the problem.

Thanks! I figured it’d be a widespread thing but couldn’t find anything on the previous couple of pages, never thought of using the search function.

Incase anyone else runs into this: I threw down all the objects down the abyss, since the objects being blown into a specific direction by the fan was probably causing the crash. Problem is now solved for me atleast!

Read full topic
item.source: Constant in-game crash at giant fan

I’m not really sure how much info you guys need besides the minidump, the exact timing of the crash is once I turn the giant fan on, I have about 10 seconds before it crashes, regardless of where I move towards.

If any more information is required I’ll be glad to include it!
